title: Pedro Alves (footballer, born 1996)
text:
Pedro Miguel Oliveira Alves (born 18 January 1996) is a Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who plays for <a href="S.C.%20Freamunde">S.C. Freamunde</a> as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
Club career.
Born in <a href="Felgueiras">Felgueiras</a>, <a href="Porto%20District">Porto District</a>, Alves played youth football for several clubs, having three spells at <a href="Vit%C3%B3ria%20S.C.">Vitória de Guimarães</a>. On 5 March 2016, while at the service of <a href="S.C.%20Braga">S.C. Braga</a>'s <a href="S.C.%20Braga%20B">reserve team</a>, he made his professional debut in the <a href="LigaPro">LigaPro</a>, coming on as a late <a href="Substitute%20%28association%20football%29">substitute</a> in a 5–1 away win against <a href="Portimonense%20S.C.">Portimonense SC</a>. His only start was on 2 April, in the 2–1 loss at <a href="S.C.%20Freamunde">S.C. Freamunde</a>.
After leaving, Alves competed exclusively in the regional divisions.
